name: Rye Rickey
keywords: orange liqueur, rye or bourbon, summer
recipeIngredient: Juice of one small lime, rind reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Stir the lime juice, rye or bourbon and orange Curaçao or Cointreau in an 8-ounce glass with 2 ice cubes. If you like, drop in the rind of half a lime. Top off with soda, stir gently and serve with a straw trimmed to extend over lip of glass by 2 inches or so, if necessary.
